meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being foppish.
meanings.sent1: His foppishnesses were evident in his extravagant clothing choices.
meanings.sent2: The foppishnesses of the gentleman made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The foppishnesses of the peacock made the other birds chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her foppishnesses shone brightly like a beacon in the room.
meanings.sent5: The foppishnesses of the prince were the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: The behavior or mannerisms of a fop.
meanings.sent1: His exaggerated gestures revealed his foppishnesses.
meanings.sent2: The foppishnesses of the actor were evident on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat's foppishnesses while grooming itself were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her foppishnesses at the party were like a performance.
meanings.sent5: The foppishnesses of the clown entertained the children.
